text: I originally shared this in  the templates channel - please take a look.
I have a project where i need to loop for the entire year and detect the month if it is on january, february, march up to december. Can anyone help me with this?
Can you please share the code you are using here
Do macros have any kind of `arguments` or `args` or spread so you can have a dynamic number of arguments inherently? Also, any way to determine the type of a variable is an array or dictionary?
